short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring the legendary crew from the world of One Piece, this extension adds adventure and excitement to your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set sail with the One Piece Live Wallpaper! Featuring the legendary crew from the world of One Piece, this extension adds adventure and excitement to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, personalize your experience with custom links, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Search the web effortlessly using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of One Piece.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Easily access your most-visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with links you use the most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on track with the built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web smoothly using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
